1.16.3.1.0.1: Fixed a couple of 1.16 specific Patchouli issues and a corner case with xmod recipes.
1.16.3.1.0.0: Initial 1.16 version. Minor bugfixes and texture changes. Added Patchouli book!

1.15.2.1.0.0: Final content version for 1.15. Minor bugfixes and texture changes. Added Patchouli book!
1.15.2.0.2.5b: Minor bugfix for the Fabricator. Adjustment to mob spawns.
1.15.2.0.2.4b: New machine textures! Also the Sequential Fabricator. Some tiny bugfixes.
1.15.2.0.2.3b: Fixed some Smelter recipe issues. More recipe support!
1.15.2.0.2.2b: Lots more mod recipe support, revamped tags. Bugfix with Dynamo connections.
1.15.2.0.2.1b: Ores generate again. And mobs are quiet.
